markdownRemark.excerpt: I‚Äôm not especially optimistic that starting a year with a list is the best approach, but I‚Äôm giving it a shot! The sheer number of books is also a bit daunting‚Ä¶
markdownRemark.html:
I‚Äôm not especially optimistic that starting a year with a list is the best approach, but I‚Äôm giving it a shot! The sheer number of books is also a bit daunting, and I‚Äôd be happy to make it through half the list üòÑ.

This year, I‚Äôm particularly interested in being more critical of what I read and keeping better notes, i.e., maintain what I read rather than just read more. I also thought about themeing the year out (e.g., architecture and urbanism, anarchism and economics), but decided I‚Äôd rather have a broad pool of options to choose from.

This is only partially formed / formatted, but these were some books I‚Äôve been thinking about for a while. I wouldn‚Äôt be surprised if I end up reading a couple from this list anyway.
